```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(rstudioapi)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

setwd(dirname(rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path))
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
data <- read.csv("czas.csv")
data$czas <- substring(data$czas, 8, length(data$czas))
colnames(data) <- c("czas", "Wrocław - Biały", "Wrocław - Kraków", "Kraków - Biały")
data |> knitr::kable(
    format = "latex",
    align = "l",
    booktabs = TRUE,
    longtable = TRUE,
    linesep = "",
    ) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(
      position = "center",
      latex_options = c("striped", "repeat_header"),
      stripe_color = "gray!15"
    )
```

\newpage
```{r, echo=FALSE, out.extra='angle=90', out.width="150%", out.height="150%"}
ggplot(data, aes(x=czas, y=`Wrocław - Biały`, group=1)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title="Czas w minutach Wrocław - Biały", y="Minuty", x="Godzina odjazdu") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, size=rel(1)),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size=rel(1)),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
dat<- data.frame(t=seq(0, 2*pi, by=0.1) )
 xhrt <- function(t) 16*sin(t)^3
 yhrt <- function(t) 13*cos(t)-5*cos(2*t)-2*cos(3*t)-cos(4*t)
 dat$y=yhrt(dat$t)
 dat$x=xhrt(dat$t)
 with(dat, plot(x,y, type="l"))
 
with(dat, polygon(x,y, col="hotpink"))
points(c(10,-10, -15, 15), c(-10, -10, 10, 10), pch=169, font=5)
text(x = 0, y = 0,                # Add text element
     "Kocham Cię Basiu", font=4, cex=2)
```
